short_summary: National Workshop Agreement - Early Psychosis Intervention
description: The request for proposal is an invitation for contractors to develop a national workshop agreement for early psychosis intervention.
full_summary:
### [Mandatory French Title] 
**National Workshop Agreement - Early Psychosis Intervention**

**General Information**

- **Reference Number:** CB-5711-91413761
- **Amendment Number**: 3
- **Solicitation Number:** 2023-09
- **Publication Date:** 2023-05-19

**Call for Proposals Overview**

The Standards Council of Canada (SCC) invites eligible bidders to submit proposals for the Development of a National Workshop Agreement (NWA) for Early Psychosis Intervention for Canadians aged 16 and above.

**Key Objectives**

- Promote the standardization of early psychosis intervention guidelines and standards in Canada

**Key Deliverables**

- Development of a National Workshop Agreement for Early Psychosis Intervention in English and French

**Contract Details**

- **Contract Start Date:** 2023-06-30
- **Contract End Date:** 2024-02-29
- **Tender Closing Date (Closed):** 2023-06-23 (12:00:00)

**Procurement Details**

- **Procurement Category:** SRV (Service)
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
- **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Language**
 Language may be submitted in either official language (English or French)

**Contact Information**

- Lianne Bernard
- lianne.bernard@scc.ca
- (613) 238-3222
- Ottawa, Ontario K1P 6L5, Canada

**Additional Resources**
- All supporting documents can be found here: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5711/scc_rfp_2023-09_nwa_early-psychosis-intervention_v1_2023-05-19_en.pdf> and <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5711/scc_rfp_2023-09_nwa_early-psychosis-intervention_mod_2023-06-15_en.pdf> and <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5711/ccn_dp_2023-09_aan-intervention-precoce-en-cas-de-psychose_mod1_2023-06-15_fr.pdf> and <https://can
